issue.title: [Docs] Remove unnecessary read the docs config file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18192](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18192). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I've realised that we have a config file for read the docs:

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/9f4c632fa9a22f7f0ea793b9bc40d9ee8d8ffad7/.readthedocs.yml>

This seems to be a pretty old configuration when pyarrow docs were hosted there. It seems there are still some docs there:

<https://pyarrow.readthedocs.io/en/latest/development.html>

This ticket aim is to remove this file config and if possible remove it from read the docs.
